languages.text: {n}Несмотря на бессильную ярость на лице, Маражай умудряется саркастично хмыкнуть.{/n} "Шевелилось в глазу? Я вижу, Тервантьяс не изменяет своим привычкам обхождения с образцами".
{n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на бессильную ярость на лице, Маражай умудряется саркастично хмыкнуть.{/n} "Шевелилось в глазу? Я вижу, Тервантьяс не изменяет своим привычкам обхождения с образцами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

{n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

languages.text: {n}尽管玛拉斋脸上充满了无能狂怒的意味，但他还是努力挤出了个尖酸的笑容。{/n}“你的眼睛不太舒服吗？看得出来，特万提亚斯对付实验对象的手段还真是一成不变。”
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管玛拉斋脸上充满了无能狂怒的意味，但他还是努力挤出了个尖酸的笑容。{/n}“你的眼睛不太舒服吗？看得出来，特万提亚斯对付实验对象的手段还真是一成不变。”

languages.text: {n}Malgré la rage qui lui déforme les traits, Marazhai se permet un petit rire sarcastique.{/n} « Les yeux qui démangent ? Je vois que Tervantias traite toujours ses cobayes de la même manière. »
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré la rage qui lui déforme les traits, Marazhai se permet un petit rire sarcastique.{/n} « Les yeux qui démangent ? Je vois que Tervantias traite toujours ses cobayes de la même manière. »

languages.text: {n}A pesar de la furia impotente de su rostro, Marazhai logra una risita sarcástica.{/n} «¿Algo en el ojo? Veo que la metodología para especímenes de Tervantias no cambia».
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de la furia impotente de su rostro, Marazhai logra una risita sarcástica.{/n} «¿Algo en el ojo? Veo que la metodología para especímenes de Tervantias no cambia».

languages.text: {n}怒りに満ちた表情を浮かべながらも、マラズハイは皮肉げに笑う。{/n}「何かが目の中でうごめいているのか？テルヴァンティアスの標本の扱い方は相変わらずのようだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒りに満ちた表情を浮かべながらも、マラズハイは皮肉げに笑う。{/n}「何かが目の中でうごめいているのか？テルヴァンティアスの標本の扱い方は相変わらずのようだな」

languages.text: {n}Trotz der machtlosen Wut auf seiner Miene ringt Marazhai sich ein sarkastisches Lachen ab.{/n} "In Eurem Auge wackelt etwas? Tervantias behandelt seine Versuchsstücke also immer noch mit denselben Methoden."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz der machtlosen Wut auf seiner Miene ringt Marazhai sich ein sarkastisches Lachen ab.{/n} "In Eurem Auge wackelt etwas? Tervantias behandelt seine Versuchsstücke also immer noch mit denselben Methoden."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yüzündeki çaresiz öfkeye rağmen iğneleyici bir biçimde gülmeyi başarıyor.{/n} "Gözünde kıpırdayan bir şeyler mi var? Tervantias, numuneleriyle hâlâ aynı şekilde oynuyor demek."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the impotent rage on his face, Marazhai manages a sarcastic chuckle.{/n} "Something wriggling in your eye? I see Tervantias has not changed his methods for handling specimens."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, yüzündeki çaresiz öfkeye rağmen iğneli bir biçimde gülmeyi başarıyor.{/n} "Gözünde kıpırdayan bir şeyler mi var? Demek Tervantias numuneleriyle hâlâ aynı şekilde oynuyor."
